programmes.show_name: New to QVC: Chinti and Parker
programmes.show_description: Indulge in playful luxury with Chinti and Parker. Discover beautifully crafted knitwear and contemporary designs, blending comfort with effortless style.

programmes.show_name: In the Garden with Thompson & Morgan
programmes.show_description: Enjoy gorgeous plants and flowers in your garden from Thompson & Morgan, one of the UK's oldest horticulture firms and an established household name for gardeners across the country.
First established over 150 years ago, join reputable gardening brand de Jager as they share high quality plants and bulbs in all shapes and sizes, to help you create your dream outdoor space.
